name: cookie-jar
description: A decentralized funding protocol with smart contract pools and frontend interface
author: Greenpill Dev Guild

scripts.postinstall: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd contracts && forge install
scripts.build: pnpm run build:contracts && pnpm run copy:deployment && pnpm run build:client
scripts.test: pnpm run test:contracts && pnpm run test:client
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:contracts && pnpm run lint:client
scripts.format: pnpm run format:contracts && pnpm run format:client
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:contracts && pnpm run clean:client
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && forge script script/DeployLocal.s.sol --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --broadcast --sender 0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266 && cd .. && pnpm copy:deployment
scripts.seed:demo: cd contracts && forge script script/SeedLocal.s.sol --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --broadcast --sender 0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266 && cd .. && pnpm copy:deployment
scripts.stop: pkill -f anvil || true && pkill -f 'forge script.*watch' || true && pkill -f 'next dev' || true && pkill -f 'npm run dev' || true
